title: Build a Feature Flag Service
description: Create a comprehensive feature flag service that wraps Firebase Remote Config with convenient methods for common feature flag patterns.
instructions:
Create a FeatureFlagService class that:

1. Uses the singleton pattern with FirebaseRemoteConfig.instance
2. Has an initialize() method that sets config settings and default values, then fetches and activates
3. Has typed getters for specific feature flags: isNewCheckoutEnabled, isDarkModeEnabled, maxCartItems
4. Has generic getBool(key), getString(key), getInt(key) methods for any flag
5. Has a refresh() method that fetches and activates new values, returning true if values changed
6. Handles errors gracefully (catch exceptions, continue with defaults)

hints.text: Use a static final instance and factory constructor for the singleton pattern
Use try/catch around fetchAndActivate to handle network errors gracefully
The fetchAndActivate method returns a bool indicating whether values changed

commonMistakes.consequence: App may behave unexpectedly if fetch fails on first launch
App crashes if network is unavailable
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap fetchAndActivate in try/catch and continue with defaults
